variable.label: Static compensation for speed stabilization
variable.comment: Factory default is 128, no effect until droop (CV57) set

variable.label: Dynamic compensation for speed stabilization
variable.comment: Factory default is 48, no effect until droop (CV57) set

variable.label: Solo operation droop compensation for speed stabilization
variable.comment: 0 is compenstation off, 15 is full on, typical value is 5

variable.label: Advanced consist droop compensation for speed stabilization
variable.comment: 0 is compenstation off, 15 is full on, typical value is 5

enumChoice.choice: F5 has no effect on speed compensation
Reverse light lead controlled by F4

variable.label: Short-circuit protection
variable.comment: Undocumented feature, occasionally requested by Digitrax tech support

variable.label: Lamp keep-alive voltage
variable.comment: 0 is no keep-alive, use with LEDs

variable.label: FX rate adjust
variable.comment: 0 is fast, 15 is slow, 4 is recommended for start

variable.label: Ditch light hold-over time
variable.comment: 0 is none, 40 is realistic 5 seconds, 255 is about 20 seconds

variable.label: Switching speed enabled by F6
variable.tooltip: When enabled, F6 reduces top speed

variable.label: Peak Speed for Auto coupler/brake on dir change
Sound Time Out
variable.tooltip: Sound stays on after loco is de-selected

factReset.label: Reset All CVs except speed table

display.item: Advanced consist droop compensation for speed stabilization

display.tooltip: Set this decoder's unique locking ID number
